source.querystring:
USE OperationsManagerDW

DECLARE @StartDate datetime
DECLARE @EndDate datetime
DECLARE @LastPerfDate datetime

SELECT  @LastPerfDate =  max(vPerf.DateTime)
FROM Perf.vPerfRaw AS vPerf

SET @StartDate = ISNULL(@StartDate, cast(cast(cast(DATEADD(DAY,-1,@LastPerfDate) as int) as float) as datetime));
SET @EndDate = ISNULL(@EndDate, cast(cast(cast(DATEADD(DAY,0,GetDate()) as int) as float) as datetime));

--These statements select the counter we want to retreive from the Data Warehouse
--Data is pulled and then placed into a temporary table
DECLARE @CounterIDs TABLE(RuleRowID INT, ObjectName NVARCHAR(60), CounterName NVARCHAR(60))
INSERT INTO @CounterIDs
SELECT RuleRowId, ObjectName, CounterName
FROM vPerformanceRule vPR
--Use this for Windows
WHERE objectName in ('LogicalDisk') AND (counterName = '% Free Space')

--Using a Common Table Expression to group the data and select the top values
DECLARE @CounterResults TABLE([DateTime] datetime, PercentFree int, Path nvarchar(255), GUID UniqueIdentifier, MERowID INT, RuleRowID INT, InstanceName nvarchar(255), ObjectName nvarchar(255), CounterName nvarchar(255))
;WITH cte AS
(
  SELECT
      Path as Computer
    , ManagedEntityGuid
    , vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId
    , DisplayName as InstanceName
    , ObjectName
    , CounterName
    , SampleValue
    , DateTime
    , vPRI.RuleRowId
    , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY vPRI.RuleRowId, Path, DisplayName ORDER BY DateTime DESC) AS rn
  FROM Perf.vPerfRaw as p INNER JOIN
       vPerformanceRuleInstance vPRI ON p.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPRI.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN
       vManagedEntity ON p.ManagedEntityRowId = vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId
       INNER JOIN @CounterIDs cID ON vPRI.RuleRowId = cID.RuleRowID
  WHERE p.DateTime >= @StartDate
)
INSERT INTO @CounterResults
SELECT DateTime
     , SampleValue
     , Computer
     , ManagedEntityGuid
     , ManagedEntityRowId
     , RuleRowId
     , InstanceName
     , ObjectName
     , CounterName
FROM cte
WHERE rn = 1

SELECT 
case
    WHEN PercentFree < 40 THEN 'Critical'
    WHEN PercentFree >= 40 AND PercentFree < 60 THEN 'Warning'
		ELSE 'Healthy'
 	end as state
,case
    WHEN PercentFree < 40 THEN 3
    WHEN PercentFree >= 40 AND PercentFree < 60 THEN 2
		ELSE 1
 	end as OrderSeq
, count(case
    WHEN PercentFree < 40 THEN 'Critical'
    WHEN PercentFree >= 40 AND PercentFree < 60 THEN 'Warning'
		ELSE 'Healthy'
 	end) as count
FROM @CounterResults
GROUP BY case
    WHEN PercentFree < 40 THEN 'Critical'
    WHEN PercentFree >= 40 AND PercentFree < 60 THEN 'Warning'
		ELSE 'Healthy'
 	end 
,case
    WHEN PercentFree < 40 THEN 3
    WHEN PercentFree >= 40 AND PercentFree < 60 THEN 2
		ELSE 1
 	end

USE OperationsManagerDW

DECLARE @StartDate datetime
DECLARE @EndDate datetime
DECLARE @LastPerfDate datetime

SELECT  @LastPerfDate =  max(vPerf.DateTime)
FROM Perf.vPerfRaw AS vPerf

SET @StartDate = ISNULL(@StartDate, cast(cast(cast(DATEADD(DAY,-1,@LastPerfDate) as int) as float) as datetime));
SET @EndDate = ISNULL(@EndDate, cast(cast(cast(DATEADD(DAY,0,GetDate()) as int) as float) as datetime));

--These statements select the counter we want to retreive from the Data Warehouse
--Data is pulled and then placed into a temporary table
DECLARE @CounterIDs TABLE(RuleRowID INT, ObjectName NVARCHAR(60), CounterName NVARCHAR(60))
INSERT INTO @CounterIDs
SELECT RuleRowId, ObjectName, CounterName
FROM vPerformanceRule vPR
--Use this for Windows
WHERE objectName in ('LogicalDisk') AND (counterName = '% Free Space')

--Using a Common Table Expression to group the data and select the top values
DECLARE @CounterResults TABLE([DateTime] datetime, PercentFree int, Path nvarchar(255), GUID UniqueIdentifier, MERowID INT, RuleRowID INT, InstanceName nvarchar(255), ObjectName nvarchar(255), CounterName nvarchar(255))
;WITH cte AS
(
  SELECT
      Path as Computer
    , ManagedEntityGuid
    , vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId
    , DisplayName as InstanceName
    , ObjectName
    , CounterName
    , SampleValue
    , DateTime
    , vPRI.RuleRowId
    , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY vPRI.RuleRowId, Path, DisplayName ORDER BY DateTime DESC) AS rn
  FROM Perf.vPerfRaw as p INNER JOIN
       vPerformanceRuleInstance vPRI ON p.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPRI.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN
       vManagedEntity ON p.ManagedEntityRowId = vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId
       INNER JOIN @CounterIDs cID ON vPRI.RuleRowId = cID.RuleRowID
  WHERE p.DateTime >= @StartDate
)
INSERT INTO @CounterResults
SELECT DateTime
     , SampleValue
     , Computer
     , ManagedEntityGuid
     , ManagedEntityRowId
     , RuleRowId
     , InstanceName
     , ObjectName
     , CounterName
FROM cte
WHERE rn = 1

SELECT 
case
    WHEN PercentFree < 40 THEN 'Critical'
    WHEN PercentFree >= 40 AND PercentFree < 60 THEN 'Warning'
		ELSE 'Healthy'
 	end as state
,case
    WHEN PercentFree < 40 THEN 3
    WHEN PercentFree >= 40 AND PercentFree < 60 THEN 2
		ELSE 1
 	end as OrderSeq
, count(case
    WHEN PercentFree < 40 THEN 'Critical'
    WHEN PercentFree >= 40 AND PercentFree < 60 THEN 'Warning'
		ELSE 'Healthy'
 	end) as count
FROM @CounterResults
GROUP BY case
    WHEN PercentFree < 40 THEN 'Critical'
    WHEN PercentFree >= 40 AND PercentFree < 60 THEN 'Warning'
		ELSE 'Healthy'
 	end 
,case
    WHEN PercentFree < 40 THEN 3
    WHEN PercentFree >= 40 AND PercentFree < 60 THEN 2
		ELSE 1
 	end

USE OperationsManagerDW

DECLARE @StartDate datetime
DECLARE @EndDate datetime
DECLARE @LastPerfDate datetime

SELECT  @LastPerfDate =  max(vPerf.DateTime)
FROM Perf.vPerfRaw AS vPerf

SET @StartDate = ISNULL(@StartDate, cast(cast(cast(DATEADD(DAY,-1,@LastPerfDate) as int) as float) as datetime));
SET @EndDate = ISNULL(@EndDate, cast(cast(cast(DATEADD(DAY,0,GetDate()) as int) as float) as datetime));

--These statements select the counter we want to retreive from the Data Warehouse
--Data is pulled and then placed into a temporary table
DECLARE @CounterIDs TABLE(RuleRowID INT, ObjectName NVARCHAR(60), CounterName NVARCHAR(60))
INSERT INTO @CounterIDs
SELECT RuleRowId, ObjectName, CounterName
FROM vPerformanceRule vPR
--Use this for Windows
WHERE objectName in ('LogicalDisk') AND (counterName = '% Free Space')

--Using a Common Table Expression to group the data and select the top values
DECLARE @CounterResults TABLE([DateTime] datetime, PercentFree int, Path nvarchar(255), GUID UniqueIdentifier, MERowID INT, RuleRowID INT, InstanceName nvarchar(255), ObjectName nvarchar(255), CounterName nvarchar(255))
;WITH cte AS
(
  SELECT
      Path as Computer
    , ManagedEntityGuid
    , vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId
    , DisplayName as InstanceName
    , ObjectName
    , CounterName
    , SampleValue
    , DateTime
    , vPRI.RuleRowId
    , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY vPRI.RuleRowId, Path, DisplayName ORDER BY DateTime DESC) AS rn
  FROM Perf.vPerfRaw as p INNER JOIN
       vPerformanceRuleInstance vPRI ON p.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPRI.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN
       vManagedEntity ON p.ManagedEntityRowId = vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId
       INNER JOIN @CounterIDs cID ON vPRI.RuleRowId = cID.RuleRowID
  WHERE p.DateTime >= @StartDate
)
INSERT INTO @CounterResults
SELECT DateTime
     , SampleValue
     , Computer
     , ManagedEntityGuid
     , ManagedEntityRowId
     , RuleRowId
     , InstanceName
     , ObjectName
     , CounterName
FROM cte
WHERE rn = 1

SELECT * 
FROM @CounterResults
WHERE PercentFree < 40
Order by PercentFree

contents.description: Servers with Less Than 40% Free Space

source.querystring:
USE OperationsManagerDW

DECLARE @StartDate datetime
DECLARE @EndDate datetime
DECLARE @LastPerfDate datetime

SELECT  @LastPerfDate =  max(vPerf.DateTime)
FROM Perf.vPerfRaw AS vPerf

SET @StartDate = ISNULL(@StartDate, cast(cast(cast(DATEADD(DAY,-1,@LastPerfDate) as int) as float) as datetime));
SET @EndDate = ISNULL(@EndDate, cast(cast(cast(DATEADD(DAY,0,GetDate()) as int) as float) as datetime));

--These statements select the counter we want to retreive from the Data Warehouse
--Data is pulled and then placed into a temporary table
DECLARE @CounterIDs TABLE(RuleRowID INT, ObjectName NVARCHAR(60), CounterName NVARCHAR(60))
INSERT INTO @CounterIDs
SELECT RuleRowId, ObjectName, CounterName
FROM vPerformanceRule vPR
--Use this for Windows
WHERE objectName in ('LogicalDisk') AND (counterName = '% Free Space')

--Using a Common Table Expression to group the data and select the top values
DECLARE @CounterResults TABLE([DateTime] datetime, PercentFree int, Path nvarchar(255), GUID UniqueIdentifier, MERowID INT, RuleRowID INT, InstanceName nvarchar(255), ObjectName nvarchar(255), CounterName nvarchar(255))
;WITH cte AS
(
  SELECT
      Path as Computer
    , ManagedEntityGuid
    , vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId
    , DisplayName as InstanceName
    , ObjectName
    , CounterName
    , SampleValue
    , DateTime
    , vPRI.RuleRowId
    , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY vPRI.RuleRowId, Path, DisplayName ORDER BY DateTime DESC) AS rn
  FROM Perf.vPerfRaw as p INNER JOIN
       vPerformanceRuleInstance vPRI ON p.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPRI.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN
       vManagedEntity ON p.ManagedEntityRowId = vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId
       INNER JOIN @CounterIDs cID ON vPRI.RuleRowId = cID.RuleRowID
  WHERE p.DateTime >= @StartDate
)
INSERT INTO @CounterResults
SELECT DateTime
     , SampleValue
     , Computer
     , ManagedEntityGuid
     , ManagedEntityRowId
     , RuleRowId
     , InstanceName
     , ObjectName
     , CounterName
FROM cte
WHERE rn = 1

SELECT top 12 [DateTime]
, PercentFree
, Path as name
, GUID as ID
, MERowID
, RuleRowID
, InstanceName
, ObjectName
, CounterName
, case
    WHEN PercentFree < 40 THEN 'Critical'
    WHEN PercentFree >= 40 AND PercentFree < 60 THEN 'Warning'
		ELSE 'Healthy'
 	end as state
FROM @CounterResults
--WHERE PercentFree < 40
Order by PercentFree

USE OperationsManagerDW

DECLARE @StartDate datetime
DECLARE @EndDate datetime
DECLARE @LastPerfDate datetime

SELECT  @LastPerfDate =  max(vPerf.DateTime)
FROM Perf.vPerfRaw AS vPerf

    , CounterName

       vPerformanceRuleInstance vPRI ON p.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPRI.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN

     , SampleValue
     , Computer
     , ManagedEntityGuid

     , RuleRowId

     , ObjectName
     , CounterName
FROM cte

, Path as name

, MERowID
, RuleRowID
, InstanceName
, ObjectName
, CounterName
, case
    WHEN PercentFree < 40 THEN 'Critical'
    WHEN PercentFree >= 40 AND PercentFree < 60 THEN 'Warning'
		ELSE 'Healthy'
 	end as state
FROM @CounterResults
--WHERE PercentFree < 40

SELECT  @LastPerfDate =  max(vPerf.DateTime)

SET @EndDate = ISNULL(@EndDate, cast(cast(cast(DATEADD(DAY,0,GetDate()) as int) as float) as datetime));

--Data is pulled and then placed into a temporary table

    , DisplayName as InstanceName

    , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY vPRI.RuleRowId, Path, DisplayName ORDER BY DateTime DESC) AS rn

source.querystring:
USE OperationsManagerDW

DECLARE @StartDate datetime
DECLARE @EndDate datetime
DECLARE @LastPerfDate datetime

SELECT  @LastPerfDate =  max(vPerf.DateTime)
FROM Perf.vPerfRaw AS vPerf

SET @StartDate = ISNULL(@StartDate, cast(cast(cast(DATEADD(DAY,-1,@LastPerfDate) as int) as float) as datetime));
SET @EndDate = ISNULL(@EndDate, cast(cast(cast(DATEADD(DAY,0,GetDate()) as int) as float) as datetime));

--These statements select the counter we want to retreive from the Data Warehouse
--Data is pulled and then placed into a temporary table
DECLARE @CounterIDs TABLE(RuleRowID INT, ObjectName NVARCHAR(60), CounterName NVARCHAR(60))
INSERT INTO @CounterIDs
SELECT RuleRowId, ObjectName, CounterName
FROM vPerformanceRule vPR
--Use this for Windows
WHERE objectName in ('LogicalDisk') AND (counterName = '% Free Space')

--Using a Common Table Expression to group the data and select the top values
DECLARE @CounterResults TABLE([DateTime] datetime, PercentFree int, Path nvarchar(255), GUID UniqueIdentifier, MERowID INT, RuleRowID INT, InstanceName nvarchar(255), ObjectName nvarchar(255), CounterName nvarchar(255))
;WITH cte AS
(
  SELECT
      Path as Computer
    , ManagedEntityGuid
    , vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId
    , DisplayName as InstanceName
    , ObjectName
    , CounterName
    , SampleValue
    , DateTime
    , vPRI.RuleRowId
    , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY vPRI.RuleRowId, Path, DisplayName ORDER BY DateTime DESC) AS rn
  FROM Perf.vPerfRaw as p INNER JOIN
       vPerformanceRuleInstance vPRI ON p.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPRI.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN
       vManagedEntity ON p.ManagedEntityRowId = vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId
       INNER JOIN @CounterIDs cID ON vPRI.RuleRowId = cID.RuleRowID
  WHERE p.DateTime >= @StartDate
)
INSERT INTO @CounterResults
SELECT DateTime
     , SampleValue
     , Computer
     , ManagedEntityGuid
     , ManagedEntityRowId
     , RuleRowId
     , InstanceName
     , ObjectName
     , CounterName
FROM cte
WHERE rn = 1

DECLARE @GraphIDs TABLE(ManagedEntityRowId INT, RuleRowID INT, Path nvarchar(255), DisplayName nvarchar(255))
INSERT INTO @GraphIDs
SELECT top 8 MERowID
, RuleRowID
, Path
, InstanceName
FROM @CounterResults
Order by PercentFree

SET @StartDate = ISNULL(@StartDate, cast(cast(cast(DATEADD(DAY,-2,GetDate()) as int) as float) as datetime));
SELECT   me.ManagedEntityRowId
     , me.DisplayName
	 , me.Path
     , me.Path + me.DisplayName AS Label
     , vRule.RuleRowId
	 , vRule.RuleSystemName
	 , vRule.RuleDefaultName
	 , vPerformanceRuleInstance.InstanceName
	 , vPerformanceRule.ObjectName
	 , vPerformanceRule.CounterName
	 , vPerformanceRule.MultiInstanceInd
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.AverageValue
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.MinValue
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.MaxValue
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.StandardDeviation
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.DateTime
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.SampleCount
FROM   vRule 
INNER JOIN vPerformanceRuleInstance ON vRule.RuleRowId = vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId 
INNER JOIN Perf.vPerfHourly ON vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = Perf.vPerfHourly.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId 
INNER JOIN @GraphIDs as me ON Perf.vPerfHourly.ManagedEntityRowId = me.ManagedEntityRowId AND vRule.RuleRowId = me.RuleRowID
INNER JOIN vPerformanceRule ON vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId
WHERE Perf.vPerfHourly.DateTime >= @StartDate
Order BY me.ManagedEntityRowId, vRule.RuleRowId, Perf.vPerfHourly.DateTime

USE OperationsManagerDW

DECLARE @StartDate datetime
DECLARE @EndDate datetime
DECLARE @LastPerfDate datetime

SELECT  @LastPerfDate =  max(vPerf.DateTime)
FROM Perf.vPerfRaw AS vPerf

SET @StartDate = ISNULL(@StartDate, cast(cast(cast(DATEADD(DAY,-1,@LastPerfDate) as int) as float) as datetime));
SET @EndDate = ISNULL(@EndDate, cast(cast(cast(DATEADD(DAY,0,GetDate()) as int) as float) as datetime));

--These statements select the counter we want to retreive from the Data Warehouse
--Data is pulled and then placed into a temporary table
DECLARE @CounterIDs TABLE(RuleRowID INT, ObjectName NVARCHAR(60), CounterName NVARCHAR(60))
INSERT INTO @CounterIDs
SELECT RuleRowId, ObjectName, CounterName
FROM vPerformanceRule vPR
--Use this for Windows
WHERE objectName in ('LogicalDisk') AND (counterName = '% Free Space')

--Using a Common Table Expression to group the data and select the top values
DECLARE @CounterResults TABLE([DateTime] datetime, PercentFree int, Path nvarchar(255), GUID UniqueIdentifier, MERowID INT, RuleRowID INT, InstanceName nvarchar(255), ObjectName nvarchar(255), CounterName nvarchar(255))
;WITH cte AS
(
  SELECT
      Path as Computer
    , ManagedEntityGuid
    , vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId
    , DisplayName as InstanceName
    , ObjectName
    , CounterName
    , SampleValue
    , DateTime
    , vPRI.RuleRowId
    , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY vPRI.RuleRowId, Path, DisplayName ORDER BY DateTime DESC) AS rn
  FROM Perf.vPerfRaw as p INNER JOIN
       vPerformanceRuleInstance vPRI ON p.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPRI.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN
       vManagedEntity ON p.ManagedEntityRowId = vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId
       INNER JOIN @CounterIDs cID ON vPRI.RuleRowId = cID.RuleRowID
  WHERE p.DateTime >= @StartDate
)
INSERT INTO @CounterResults
SELECT DateTime
     , SampleValue
     , Computer
     , ManagedEntityGuid
     , ManagedEntityRowId
     , RuleRowId
     , InstanceName
     , ObjectName
     , CounterName
FROM cte
WHERE rn = 1

DECLARE @GraphIDs TABLE(ManagedEntityRowId INT, RuleRowID INT, Path nvarchar(255), DisplayName nvarchar(255))
INSERT INTO @GraphIDs
SELECT top 8 MERowID
, RuleRowID
, Path
, InstanceName
FROM @CounterResults
Order by PercentFree

SET @StartDate = ISNULL(@StartDate, cast(cast(cast(DATEADD(DAY,-2,GetDate()) as int) as float) as datetime));
SELECT   me.ManagedEntityRowId
     , me.DisplayName
	 , me.Path
     , me.Path + me.DisplayName AS Label
     , vRule.RuleRowId
	 , vRule.RuleSystemName
	 , vRule.RuleDefaultName
	 , vPerformanceRuleInstance.InstanceName
	 , vPerformanceRule.ObjectName
	 , vPerformanceRule.CounterName
	 , vPerformanceRule.MultiInstanceInd
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.AverageValue
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.MinValue
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.MaxValue
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.StandardDeviation
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.DateTime
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.SampleCount
FROM   vRule 
INNER JOIN vPerformanceRuleInstance ON vRule.RuleRowId = vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId 
INNER JOIN Perf.vPerfHourly ON vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = Perf.vPerfHourly.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId 
INNER JOIN @GraphIDs as me ON Perf.vPerfHourly.ManagedEntityRowId = me.ManagedEntityRowId AND vRule.RuleRowId = me.RuleRowID
INNER JOIN vPerformanceRule ON vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId
WHERE Perf.vPerfHourly.DateTime >= @StartDate
Order BY me.ManagedEntityRowId, vRule.RuleRowId, Perf.vPerfHourly.DateTime

USE OperationsManagerDW

DECLARE @StartDate datetime
DECLARE @EndDate datetime
DECLARE @LastPerfDate datetime

SELECT  @LastPerfDate =  max(vPerf.DateTime)
FROM Perf.vPerfRaw AS vPerf

SET @StartDate = ISNULL(@StartDate, cast(cast(cast(DATEADD(DAY,-1,@LastPerfDate) as int) as float) as datetime));
SET @EndDate = ISNULL(@EndDate, cast(cast(cast(DATEADD(DAY,0,GetDate()) as int) as float) as datetime));

--These statements select the counter we want to retreive from the Data Warehouse
--Data is pulled and then placed into a temporary table
DECLARE @CounterIDs TABLE(RuleRowID INT, ObjectName NVARCHAR(60), CounterName NVARCHAR(60))
INSERT INTO @CounterIDs
SELECT RuleRowId, ObjectName, CounterName
FROM vPerformanceRule vPR
--Use this for Windows
WHERE objectName in ('LogicalDisk') AND (counterName = '% Free Space')

--Using a Common Table Expression to group the data and select the top values
DECLARE @CounterResults TABLE([DateTime] datetime, PercentFree int, Path nvarchar(255), GUID UniqueIdentifier, MERowID INT, RuleRowID INT, InstanceName nvarchar(255), ObjectName nvarchar(255), CounterName nvarchar(255))
;WITH cte AS
(
  SELECT
      Path as Computer
    , ManagedEntityGuid
    , vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId
    , DisplayName as InstanceName
    , ObjectName
    , CounterName
    , SampleValue
    , DateTime
    , vPRI.RuleRowId
    , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY vPRI.RuleRowId, Path, DisplayName ORDER BY DateTime DESC) AS rn
  FROM Perf.vPerfRaw as p INNER JOIN
       vPerformanceRuleInstance vPRI ON p.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPRI.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN
       vManagedEntity ON p.ManagedEntityRowId = vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId
       INNER JOIN @CounterIDs cID ON vPRI.RuleRowId = cID.RuleRowID
  WHERE p.DateTime >= @StartDate
)
INSERT INTO @CounterResults
SELECT DateTime
     , SampleValue
     , Computer
     , ManagedEntityGuid
     , ManagedEntityRowId
     , RuleRowId
     , InstanceName
     , ObjectName
     , CounterName
FROM cte
WHERE rn = 1

DECLARE @GraphIDs TABLE(ManagedEntityRowId INT, RuleRowID INT, Path nvarchar(255), DisplayName nvarchar(255))
INSERT INTO @GraphIDs
SELECT top 12 MERowID
, RuleRowID
, Path
, InstanceName
FROM @CounterResults
Order by PercentFree

SET @StartDate = cast(cast(cast(DATEADD(DAY,-12,GetDate()) as int) as float) as datetime);
SELECT  me.ManagedEntityRowId
     , me.DisplayName
	 , me.Path
     , me.Path + me.DisplayName AS Label
     , vRule.RuleRowId
	 , vRule.RuleSystemName
	 , vRule.RuleDefaultName
	 , vPerformanceRuleInstance.InstanceName
	 , vPerformanceRule.ObjectName
	 , vPerformanceRule.CounterName
	 , vPerformanceRule.MultiInstanceInd
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.AverageValue
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.MinValue
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.MaxValue
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.StandardDeviation
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.DateTime
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.SampleCount
FROM   vRule 
INNER JOIN vPerformanceRuleInstance ON vRule.RuleRowId = vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId 
INNER JOIN Perf.vPerfHourly ON vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = Perf.vPerfHourly.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId 
INNER JOIN @GraphIDs as me ON Perf.vPerfHourly.ManagedEntityRowId = me.ManagedEntityRowId AND vRule.RuleRowId = me.RuleRowID
INNER JOIN vPerformanceRule ON vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId
WHERE Perf.vPerfHourly.DateTime >= @StartDate
Order BY me.ManagedEntityRowId, vRule.RuleRowId, Perf.vPerfHourly.DateTime

USE OperationsManagerDW

DECLARE @StartDate datetime
DECLARE @EndDate datetime
DECLARE @LastPerfDate datetime

SELECT  @LastPerfDate =  max(vPerf.DateTime)
FROM Perf.vPerfRaw AS vPerf

SET @StartDate = ISNULL(@StartDate, cast(cast(cast(DATEADD(DAY,-1,@LastPerfDate) as int) as float) as datetime));
SET @EndDate = ISNULL(@EndDate, cast(cast(cast(DATEADD(DAY,0,GetDate()) as int) as float) as datetime));

--These statements select the counter we want to retreive from the Data Warehouse
--Data is pulled and then placed into a temporary table
DECLARE @CounterIDs TABLE(RuleRowID INT, ObjectName NVARCHAR(60), CounterName NVARCHAR(60))
INSERT INTO @CounterIDs
SELECT RuleRowId, ObjectName, CounterName
FROM vPerformanceRule vPR
--Use this for Windows
WHERE objectName in ('LogicalDisk') AND (counterName = '% Free Space')

--Using a Common Table Expression to group the data and select the top values
DECLARE @CounterResults TABLE([DateTime] datetime, PercentFree int, Path nvarchar(255), GUID UniqueIdentifier, MERowID INT, RuleRowID INT, InstanceName nvarchar(255), ObjectName nvarchar(255), CounterName nvarchar(255))
;WITH cte AS
(
  SELECT
      Path as Computer
    , ManagedEntityGuid
    , vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId
    , DisplayName as InstanceName
    , ObjectName
    , CounterName
    , SampleValue
    , DateTime
    , vPRI.RuleRowId
    , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY vPRI.RuleRowId, Path, DisplayName ORDER BY DateTime DESC) AS rn
  FROM Perf.vPerfRaw as p INNER JOIN
       vPerformanceRuleInstance vPRI ON p.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPRI.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN
       vManagedEntity ON p.ManagedEntityRowId = vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId
       INNER JOIN @CounterIDs cID ON vPRI.RuleRowId = cID.RuleRowID
  WHERE p.DateTime >= @StartDate
)
INSERT INTO @CounterResults
SELECT DateTime
     , SampleValue
     , Computer
     , ManagedEntityGuid
     , ManagedEntityRowId
     , RuleRowId
     , InstanceName
     , ObjectName
     , CounterName
FROM cte
WHERE rn = 1

DECLARE @GraphIDs TABLE(ManagedEntityRowId INT, RuleRowID INT, Path nvarchar(255), DisplayName nvarchar(255))
INSERT INTO @GraphIDs
SELECT top 12 MERowID
, RuleRowID
, Path
, InstanceName
FROM @CounterResults
Order by PercentFree

SET @StartDate = cast(cast(cast(DATEADD(DAY,-12,GetDate()) as int) as float) as datetime);
SELECT  me.ManagedEntityRowId
     , me.DisplayName
	 , me.Path
     , me.Path + me.DisplayName AS Label
     , vRule.RuleRowId
	 , vRule.RuleSystemName
	 , vRule.RuleDefaultName
	 , vPerformanceRuleInstance.InstanceName
	 , vPerformanceRule.ObjectName
	 , vPerformanceRule.CounterName
	 , vPerformanceRule.MultiInstanceInd
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.AverageValue
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.MinValue
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.MaxValue
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.StandardDeviation
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.DateTime
	 , Perf.vPerfHourly.SampleCount
FROM   vRule 
INNER JOIN vPerformanceRuleInstance ON vRule.RuleRowId = vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId 
INNER JOIN Perf.vPerfHourly ON vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = Perf.vPerfHourly.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId 
INNER JOIN @GraphIDs as me ON Perf.vPerfHourly.ManagedEntityRowId = me.ManagedEntityRowId AND vRule.RuleRowId = me.RuleRowID
INNER JOIN vPerformanceRule ON vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId
WHERE Perf.vPerfHourly.DateTime >= @StartDate
Order BY me.ManagedEntityRowId, vRule.RuleRowId, Perf.vPerfHourly.DateTime
